content: decreased p purl wyib with yarn held to the back of the work k2tog knit two stitches together yo yarn over wrap and turn bring yarn to the front of the knitting sl next stich onto right needle as if to purl turn work over right needle is now on the left side w+t bring the yarn forward and slip the stich from the left sl slip st purlwise needle to the right bring the yarn to the back stitch is now wrapped and work has been turned continue to knit this pattern is for personal use only please do not sell this pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern pattern text and images © kristen finlay for pattern support please contact design@skeinyarn com designed exclusively for skein artisan yarn and fibre www skeinyarn com 3
